alert.note: Alert for Bent; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 08 at 2:19AM MDT until June 08 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR EAST CENTRAL BENT AND WEST CENTRAL PROWERS COUNTIES... At 219 AM MDT, local law enforcement reported flooding from thunderstorms producing heavy rain in portions of Main Street in Lamar. Other flooding may be occuring along portions of the Highway 50 corridor, between Hasty and Granada. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lamar, Granada and Hasty. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
